Package advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InternationalisationManager
    Singleton class that creates it's own instance to handle all forms of languages to be used within the game Provides methods to get respective strings based on user language, will use the language provided by the locale If the locale isn't supported, defaults to English-GB
    Parser
    The parser is designed to take input from the user one line at a time, this line is then split based on the regex pattern " " and separated into strings of an Array to then be passed into the constructor for CommandExecution.
    PrintableList<E>
    Simple adaption of the ArrayList that allows for smart formatting and printing of the list of objects
    XMLManager
    The XMLManager is designed to load and interact with all other management across the game to add rooms/items/characters into the game.
